verses.verse: ( Forty-Two Journeys of the Israelites) אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh These מַסְעֵ֣י <WH4550> mas·‘ê [are] the journeys בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- vvv יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of the Israelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer when יָצְא֛וּ <WH3318> yā·ṣə·’ū they came out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> lə·ṣiḇ·’ō·ṯām by their divisions בְּיַד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- under the leadership מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mō·šeh of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> wə·’a·hă·rōn and Aaron.

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> way·yiḵ·tōḇ recorded מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מוֹצָאֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4161> mō·w·ṣā·’ê·hem the stages לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> lə·mas·‘ê·hem of their journey. עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- At פִּ֣י <WH6310> pî command, יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD’s וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> wə·’êl·leh These מַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> mas·‘ê·hem are the stages לְמוֹצָאֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4161> lə·mō·w·ṣā·’ê·hem listed by their starting points:

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū [the Israelites] set out מֵֽרַעְמְסֵס֙ <WH7486> mê·ra‘·mə·sês from Rameses. בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba·ḥō·ḏeš month, הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> hā·ri·šō·wn of the first בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> ba·ḥă·miš·šāh On the fifteenth עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> ‘ā·śār ... י֖וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la·ḥō·ḏeš - הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> hā·ri·šō·wn on מִֽמָּחֳרַ֣ת <WH4283> mim·mā·ḥo·raṯ the day after הַפֶּ֗סַח <WH6453> hap·pe·saḥ the Passover, יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> yā·ṣə·’ū marched out בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- [They] יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> bə·yāḏ defiantly רָמָ֔ה <WH7311> rā·māh ... ( Or marched out boldly; literally marched out with an upraised hand) לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> lə·‘ê·nê in full view כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- of all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> miṣ·rā·yim the Egyptians,

וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4713> ū·miṣ·ra·yim [who] מְקַבְּרִ֗ים <WH6912> mə·qab·bə·rîm were burying אֵת֩ <WH853> ’êṯ - אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> hik·kāh had struck down יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh whom the LORD בָּהֶ֖ם Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) among them; כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) all בְּכ֑וֹר 1060 N-ms ( bə·ḵō·wr) [their] firstborn, וּבֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם 430 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-mpc│3mp ( ū·ḇê·lō·hê·hem) against their gods. עָשָׂ֥ה 6213 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ‘ā·śāh) had executed יְהוָ֖ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) for the LORD שְׁפָטִֽים׃ 8201 N-mp ( šə·p̄ā·ṭîm) judgment

וַיִּסְע֥וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū set out בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- The Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... מֵרַעְמְסֵ֑ס <WH7486> mê·ra‘·mə·sês from Rameses וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּסֻכֹּֽת׃ <WH5523> bə·suk·kōṯ at Succoth.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <WH5523> mis·suk·kōṯ from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> ḇə·’ê·ṯām at Etham, אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> biq·ṣêh on the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> ham·miḏ·bār of the wilderness.

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵֽאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> mê·’ê·ṯām from Etham וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> way·yā·šāḇ and turned back עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- to פִּ֣י <WH6367> pî vvv הַחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> ha·ḥî·rōṯ Pi-hahiroth, אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- opposite פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> pə·nê ... בַּ֣עַל <WH1189> ba·‘al vvv צְפ֑וֹן <WH1189> ṣə·p̄ō·wn Baal-zephon, וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and they camped לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lip̄·nê near מִגְדֹּֽל׃ <WH4024> miḡ·dōl Migdol.

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê from הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> ha·ḥî·rōṯ Pi-hahiroth ( Some Hebrew manuscripts, SP, and Vulgate; see verse 7; most MT manuscripts Hahiroth) וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> way·ya·‘aḇ·rū and crossed בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ḇə·ṯō·wḵ- through הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hay·yām the sea, הַמִּדְבָּ֑רָה <WH4057> ham·miḏ·bā·rāh into the wilderness, וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> way·yê·lə·ḵū ... דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> de·reḵ ... שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> šə·lō·šeṯ and they journeyed three days יָמִים֙ <WH3117> yā·mîm ... בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> bə·miḏ·bar into the Wilderness אֵתָ֔ם <WH864> ’ê·ṯām of Etham וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמָרָֽה׃ <WH4785> bə·mā·rāh at Marah.

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמָּרָ֔ה <WH4785> mim·mā·rāh from Marah וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> way·yā·ḇō·’ū and came אֵילִ֑מָה <WH362> ’ê·li·māh to Elim וּ֠בְאֵילִם <WH362> ū·ḇə·’ê·lim ..., שְׁתֵּ֣ים <WH8147> šə·têm where there were twelve עֶשְׂרֵ֞ה <WH6240> ‘eś·rêh ... עֵינֹ֥ת <WH5869> ‘ê·nōṯ springs מַ֛יִם <WH4325> ma·yim ... וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> wə·šiḇ·‘îm and seventy תְּמָרִ֖ים <WH8558> tə·mā·rîm palm trees, וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū- and they camped שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> šām there.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵאֵילִ֑ם <WH362> mê·’ê·lim from Elim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- by יַם־ <WH3220> yam- Sea. ( Or the Sea of Reeds; also in verse 11) סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> sūp̄ the Red

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִיַּם־ <WH3220> mî·yam- Sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> sūp̄ from the Red וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> bə·miḏ·bar- in the Desert סִֽין׃ <WH5512> sîn of Sin. ( The geographical name Sin is related to Sinai and should not be mistaken for the English word sin; also in verse 12.)

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mim·miḏ·bar- from the Desert סִ֑ין <WH5512> sîn of Sin וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּדָפְקָֽה׃ <WH1850> bə·ḏā·p̄ə·qāh at Dophkah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִדָּפְקָ֑ה <WH1850> mid·dā·p̄ə·qāh from Dophkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּאָלֽוּשׁ׃ <WH442> bə·’ā·lūš at Alush.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵאָל֑וּשׁ <WH442> mê·’ā·lūš from Alush וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בִּרְפִידִ֔ם <WH7508> bir·p̄î·ḏim at Rephidim, וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> hā·yāh there was שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> šām where מַ֛יִם <WH4325> ma·yim water לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> lā·‘ām for the people לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> liš·tō·wṯ to drink.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵרְפִידִ֑ם <WH7508> mê·rə·p̄î·ḏim from Rephidim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> bə·miḏ·bar in the Wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> sî·nāy of Sinai.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> mim·miḏ·bar from the Wilderness סִינָ֑י <WH5514> sî·nāy of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּקִבְרֹ֥ת <WH6914> bə·qiḇ·rōṯ vvv הַֽתַּאֲוָֽה׃ <WH6914> hat·ta·’ă·wāh at Kibroth-hattaavah.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִקִּבְרֹ֣ת <WH6914> miq·qiḇ·rōṯ from הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH6914> hat·ta·’ă·wāh Kibroth-hattaavah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בַּחֲצֵרֹֽת׃ <WH2698> ba·ḥă·ṣê·rōṯ at Hazeroth.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵחֲצֵרֹ֑ת <WH2698> mê·ḥă·ṣê·rōṯ from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּרִתְמָֽה׃ <WH7575> bə·riṯ·māh at Rithmah.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵרִתְמָ֑ה <WH7575> mê·riṯ·māh from Rithmah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּרִמֹּ֥ן <WH7428> bə·rim·mōn vvv פָּֽרֶץ׃ <WH7428> pā·reṣ at Rimmon-perez.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵרִמֹּ֣ן <WH7428> mê·rim·mōn from פָּ֑רֶץ <WH7428> pā·reṣ Rimmon-perez וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּלִבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> bə·liḇ·nāh at Libnah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִלִּבְנָ֑ה <WH3841> mil·liḇ·nāh from Libnah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּרִסָּֽה׃ <WH7446> bə·ris·sāh at Rissah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵרִסָּ֑ה <WH7446> mê·ris·sāh from Rissah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בִּקְהֵלָֽתָה׃ <WH6954> biq·hê·lā·ṯāh at Kehelathah.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִקְּהֵלָ֑תָה <WH6954> miq·qə·hê·lā·ṯāh from Kehelathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּהַר־ <WH2022> bə·har- at Mount שָֽׁפֶר׃ <WH8234> šā·p̄er Shepher.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵֽהַר־ <WH2022> mê·har- from Mount שָׁ֑פֶר <WH8234> šā·p̄er Shepher וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בַּחֲרָדָֽה׃ <WH2732> ba·ḥă·rā·ḏāh at Haradah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵחֲרָדָ֑ה <WH2732> mê·ḥă·rā·ḏāh from Haradah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמַקְהֵלֹֽת׃ <WH4722> bə·maq·hê·lōṯ at Makheloth.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמַּקְהֵלֹ֑ת <WH4722> mim·maq·hê·lōṯ from Makheloth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּתָֽחַת׃ <WH8480> bə·ṯā·ḥaṯ at Tahath.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִתָּ֑חַת <WH8480> mit·tā·ḥaṯ from Tahath וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּתָֽרַח׃ <WH8646> bə·ṯā·raḥ at Terah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִתָּ֑רַח <WH8646> mit·tā·raḥ from Terah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמִתְקָֽה׃ <WH4989> bə·miṯ·qāh at Mithkah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמִּתְקָ֑ה <WH4989> mim·miṯ·qāh from Mithkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּחַשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH2832> bə·ḥaš·mō·nāh at Hashmonah.
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵֽחַשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <WH2832> mê·ḥaš·mō·nāh from Hashmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּמֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH4149> bə·mō·sê·rō·wṯ at Moseroth.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִמֹּסֵר֑וֹת <WH4149> mim·mō·sê·rō·wṯ from Moseroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1142> biḇ·nê vvv יַעֲקָֽן׃ <WH1142> ya·‘ă·qān at Bene-jaakan.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1142> mib·bə·nê from יַעֲקָ֑ן <WH1142> ya·‘ă·qān Bene-jaakan וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּחֹ֥ר <WH2735> bə·ḥōr vvv הַגִּדְגָּֽד׃ <WH2735> hag·giḏ·gāḏ at Hor-haggidgad.

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū They set out מֵחֹ֣ר <WH2735> mê·ḥōr from הַגִּדְגָּ֑ד <WH2735> hag·giḏ·gāḏ Hor-haggidgad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and camped בְּיָטְבָֽתָה׃ <WH3193> bə·yā·ṭə·ḇā·ṯāh at Jotbathah.
